teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Australian Gay, Lesbian and Friends
teams.loan_because: We really care about people.
teams.description: A very diverse minority group that believes in living and letting others live the way they chose.

teams.name: Disabled Persons
teams.loan_because: This is a community of people interested in making a difference for entrepreneurs  and families who are affected by illness or physical, intellectual, or psychiatric disability.  We also support caregivers, entrepreneurs involved in the medical profession and anyone who is touched in any way by disabilities, chronic illnesses or one time medical needs.
teams.description:
Anyone who has an interest in disability issues or rights may join our team. This team was started as a way to find and keep track of Kiva entrepreneurs who are affected by illnesses or disabilities so that we might see what kind of difference we are making in the lives of these entrepreneurs. 

This team was originally created by a group of KivaFriends, but has always been open to anyone.  If you are interested, you can read about the team history here:

teams.loan_because:

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Conquer Possibility
teams.loan_because:
A strong nation, like a strong person, can afford to be gentle, firm, thoughtful, and restrained. It can afford to extend a helping hand to others. 

The greatest crime in the world is not developing your potential. When you do what you do best, you are helping not only yourself, but the world. I invite you to begin a new season where we can work together hand in hand and do anything with the possibilty to conquer the world with a smile of a helping out to those who needs the light to shine in their path...
teams.description:
There's a difference between interest and commitment. When you're interested in doing something, you do it only when circumstance permit. When you're committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results

Also check out this link below...

www.kickstarter.com/projects/1672484494/ball-feature-film-sag-aftra-modified-low-budget

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: HALF THE SKY: Empowering Women
teams.loan_because: we believe empowering women is the key to alleviating social injustice and achieving world stability.
teams.description:
Inspired by the book HALF THE SKY written by Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, our team is committed to helping curb culturally accepted abuse of women around the world.

Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/HALFTHESKYEmpoweringWomenKIVATeam

teams.name: Half the Sky
teams.loan_because: "Women and girls aren’t the problem; they’re the solution."
teams.description: Empowering women with microloans sparks generations of economic change.

teams.name: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls
teams.loan_because: You change the world one kindness at a time.
teams.description: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls knows there is still inequality all over the world. The basis of that inequality is that you are being denied the ability to be yourself. We must all be be able to make choices that can lead to a better life. Micro-loans make choices available.

teams.name: The Lending Hand
teams.loan_because: we love the world.
teams.description: Friends and family - Lets combine our efforts!

teams.name: Team Minneapolis/St. Paul
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the lives of those in need.
teams.description: We are a team of Twin Cities residents concerned about world poverty. We host events around the city to raise money for Kiva loans, which we use to make new loans once the money is returned. We hope, as a community, to improve the plight of the impoverished by using microlending.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: Libertarians
teams.loan_because: Economic prosperity is achieved not through mere employment or possession of goods, but through production. The best possible means of ending poverty is through increasing wealth by enabling production and encouraging voluntary trade around the world. There are few better means of achieving this than through micro-lending.
teams.description: We embrace individual liberty and support collective prosperity through mutually-beneficial voluntary trade.

teams.name: Libertarian Team
teams.loan_because: As libertarians, we favor voluntary charity over government force to bring about positive change.
teams.description: The libertarian philosophy is one of personal and economic freedom.  We advocate charity and free-markets over government coercion and force.

teams.name: Dermalogica
teams.loan_because:
NEWS! In honor of International Women's Day, if you join our team, then make a loan and credit our team, we'll match your loan with one of our own!!*

We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community.  We want to help put more women on the road to Financial Independence Through Entrepreneurship. Join the FITE!
* We'll match up to 3,000 loans.
teams.description: Dermalogica is the number one line of skin care products for professional skin therapists and consumers worldwide.

teams.loan_because: we have lost of clients for our service. Our need to collect more money for increase our worker and service ability.

teams.name: Baby Janssens
teams.loan_because: We care

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Vegetarians and Vegans on Kiva
teams.loan_because: We have a vision of a healthier, more compassionate and sustainable world. Hard work is often not enough to escape poverty and we gladly welcome the opportunity to give people and their businesses a fighting chance. Our team focus is on making loans to borrowers who don't use animals in their businesses.
teams.description: We're vegetarians and vegans, and those thinking about making the change.  We welcome everyone regardless of their motivation for going veggie.

teams.name: Mark Dean Trader's Mind
teams.loan_because: It is great to be part of such a large network of people, such as Kiva, from all around the world, working to assist others in such an innovative way.
teams.description: Mark is a financial trader, and risk management consultant, assisting others to clarify, simplify and work with more focus in their trading.

teams.name: Jesuit and Ignatian Family
teams.whereabouts: "Our home is the open road" - Jeronimo Nadal
teams.loan_because: "There is no genuine conversion to the love of God without conversion to the love of neighbor and, therefore, to the demands of justice. [...] Christian salvation consists in an undivided love of the Father and of the neighbor and of justice.  Since evangelization is proclamation of that faith which is made operative in love of others, the promotion of justice is indispensable to it." - Decree 4, General Congregation 32
teams.description: Individuals positively influenced and inspired by the Ignatian charism, whether as a Jesuit, a volunteer, someone interested in Ignatian spirituality, or alumni/alumnae of Jesuit high schools, colleges and universities.

teams.name: For Battle!
teams.description: At the moment, we're a closed group of people who know each other, until we can get a bit more organised and work out what we want to achieve - aside from World Domination of course! ;-)

teams.name: Ship for World Youth Alumni Association
teams.loan_because: Microlending is a great vehicle to improve the quality of living of people living all over the world.
teams.description:
The Ship for World Youth (SWY) program, operated by Cabinet Office, Government of Japan, is a program that involves youths from Japan and countries around the world. They board the Ship for World Youth, live together, and while on board and when visiting the different countries, they study and discuss common issues from a global perspective and participate in other various activities that involve multi-cultural and multi-national exchange opportunities. 

For our team members, we are generally trying to lend to countries that have already participated on the SWY. Not all of the countries that have been on SWY have microfinance loans on Kiva, so please look for countries that were on your ship using the map on the lend page.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Smile Train
teams.loan_because:
There are millions of children with unrepaired cleft lips and palates who have little to no prospect of ever being helped. Their parents are so poor they could never afford surgery. Being born with a cleft in a developing country is truly a curse, and no one knows how many newborns with clefts are killed or abandoned right after birth.  

Through Smile Train's free cleft surgery program, a 45 minute surgery gives these children a future and a second chance at life that they never thought they'd get. Let's change the world, one smile at a time!

Through our Kiva lending we want to raise awareness and support of the wonderful work Smile Train does in providing free cleft repair surgeries around the world. If our team logo is displayed on loans' top lending teams we hope other Kiva lenders will learn about Smile Train's work too.  Won't you join us?
.
teams.description:
We are a diverse group of Kiva lenders from different backgrounds and different areas of the world who share a common desire to support the effort to bring a repair surgery to every child who needs one.  Our team also includes staff members of Smile Train and Kiva and other microfinance ventures.  We would be happy for you to join our team too!

The little girl in our team logo is Pinki Sonkar.  She was born with a severe cleft into a family that was surviving on less than a dollar a day in a poor rural village in India. She could not go to school because the other children threw rocks at her.  Smile Pinki tells the story of how her life was changed forever by a free repair surgery at a Smile Train partner hospital.  Contact a team captain for more information if you would like a free DVD of this Academy Award winning documentary.

Where is Pinki Now - http://bit.ly/WhereisPinkiNow - This 5 minute video has interviews with Pinki's parents and teachers and video of Pinki in school.  You can see that cleft surgery brings a total transformation to the lives of these kids.

Wang Li Got Married - http://bit.ly/WangLi - this video tells the moving story of Smile Train's very first patient and how her life was totally changed.

Smile Train in Mexico - http://bit.ly/SmileMexico - this video is for Adrián and the Arenal Group. As a team we loaned to help his parents, and we hope that through Smile Train Adrián will get the care that he needs.

Kiva Team Smile Train fund raiser page - http://bit.ly/DonateTeamSmileTrain - If you would like to make donation to support Smile Train's work you can do so here.  Even if you don't make a donation, please sign our guest book!      Thank you for helping the kids!      

Other tax advantaged donation links:
Canada - http://www.canadahelps.org/CharityProfilePage.aspx?CharityID=s98822
Great Britain - http://www.smiletrain.org.uk/
India - http://www.smiletrainindia.org/
Italy - http://www.smiletrain.it/

Check out the distribution of our team's impact around the world:  http://kivafolio.appspot.com/report?user=Smile_Train

Check our team statistics:  http://smiletrain.vijayr.net/stats.php
.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

abaca              www.kiva.org/lend/479304 
bees and beehives   www.kiva.org/lend/416522 
bicycle repair   www.kiva.org/lend/422950

eco-friendly products   www.kiva.org/lend/369833 
electric vehicles    www.kiva.org/lend/475485

Fair Trade (sustainably grown) coffee  www.kiva.org/lend/459274  
farm tools & equipment   www.kiva.org/lend/405404 
flowers   www.kiva.org/lend/355897 
fuel-efficient cookstoves www.kiva.org/lend/533728 
insulation   www.kiva.org/lend/422895 
manure & other natural fertilizers   www.kiva.org/lend/425938
natural medicines from native plants     www.kiva.org/lend/484068 
organic farms or gardens   www.kiva.org/lend/389681 
organic food www.kiva.org/lend/489520
organic seeds   www.kiva.org/lend/431157 
recycling   www.kiva.org/lend/443724 
recycling tools   www.kiva.org/lend/419761
sanitation www.kiva.org/lend/475282 
scrap metal   www.kiva.org/lend/405683 
scrap wood   www.kiva.org/lend/476241
shoe repair   www.kiva.org/lend/413675 
solar lanterns or lamps   www.kiva.org/lend/451508
solar lighting kits (distribution)   www.kiva.org/lend/426323
solar panels (leasing)   www.kiva.org/lend/426140
solar panels (home or business installations)   www.kiva.org/lend/358310
spare parts (bicycles)   www.kiva.org/lend/422456
spare parts (other)   www.kiva.org/lend/421554 
tailoring   www.kiva.org/lend/398446 
tree seedlings   www.kiva.org/lend/424330 
used clothing   www.kiva.org/lend/424287
used furniture   www.kiva.org/lend/464084 
used shoes   www.kiva.org/lend/449579
water tanks   www.kiva.org/lend/523269 

Many Kiva Field Partners offer one or more kinds of green loans including, but not limited to: 

ACCIONA Microenergía México www.kiva.org/partners/370

teams.name: Downsizer.net
teams.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves.
teams.description: Downsizer is a not-for-profit online community, a resource for people who want to live more sustainably.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: Auntie
teams.description:
Dit is een besloten team, voor leden van Auntie, Stichting voor (ouders van) adoptiekinderen uit Nigeria.
Wil je lid worden, geef dan je familiegegevens aan ons door zodat wij je kunnen herkennen als Auntielid.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Laura's Fabulous 40th Fundraiser
teams.loan_because: To celebrate my 40th birthday I wanted to do something different than just the usual party. I chose to support Kiva because it demonstrates the power of the individual to affect change.
teams.description: We are a group of friends and family members who want to do good in the world, and maybe have some fun along the way!

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Team OrgNot
teams.loan_because: We believe that making businesses stronger is the best way to fight poverty.
teams.description: We care about solving the poverty problem, and hope that our money and expertise will begin that process for you and your community.

teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik

teams.loan_because: Putting in our humble share to make the world a better place.
teams.description: Concept7

teams.name: Denmark
teams.loan_because:
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood. 
(Article 1  of United Nations Declaration of Human Rights)
teams.description:
Team for everyone in Denmark, who are taking part of this great opportunity to improve the world one step at a time.

Use this to recruite friends. http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Location: HeartMath Denmark
Street: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 floor , 1202 Copenhagen K

More Info:: Facebook-group: Kiva Denmark  link: http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gruppen her er for alle i Danmark, der støtter denne fantastiske ide om at hjælpe verden ét skridt af gangen.

Vil du hjælpe: Inviter venner - fortæl om Kiva 
http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Kiva Denmark holder møder om hvad vi kan gøre for at udbrede kendskabet til denne unikke måde at hjælpe på. Kontakt: Kristine.flagstad@uni-c.dk hvis du har nogen ideer eller skriv en meddelelse her til gruppen.

Næste møde holdes hos: HeartMath Danmark
Adresse: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 sal, 1202 Copenhagen K
Dato: Ikke fastlagt pt. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Se evt. mere på facebook gruppen : http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

teams.name: planet5D
teams.loan_because: we believe in helping out others
teams.description: planet5D is a website devoted to HDSLR cameras - and we're photographers

teams.name: Open Source
teams.loan_because: making micro-loans to people all over the world allows them to lift themselves out of poverty rather than requiring charity. We believe that sharing and thus empowering others is to the benefit of us all. That's at the heart of Kiva, as well as at the heart of open source software.
teams.description: Open source software comes with the liberty to use, study, improve and share the software any way you want, made concrete and reliable by an OSI-approved copyright license. It empowers you to control your own world without needing permission from anyone else to make your life better.

teams.name: Seventh-day Adventists
teams.loan_because:
Through humanitarian acts we make known the just, merciful and loving character of God.

To work with those in need is an expression of our love for God.

The compassionate ministry of Jesus is its own abundant motive and reward.
teams.description:
The SDA Church is a Christian denomination which is distinguished mainly by its observance of Saturday, the original seventh day of the Judeo-Christian week, as the Sabbath.

The world church is governed by a General Conference, with smaller regions administered by divisions, union conferences and local conferences. It currently has a worldwide membership of over 15 million people, has a missionary presence in over 200 countries and territories and is ethnically and culturally diverse. The church operates numerous schools, hospitals and publishing houses worldwide, as well as a prominent humanitarian aid organization known as the Adventist Development and Relief Agency (ADRA).

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Sverok
teams.loan_because: Många i Sverok känner ett engagemang för sin omvärld och för sina medmänniskor!
teams.description: Vi är medlemmar i Sverok, Sveriges största ungdomsförbund.
